post.content:
BMC Remedy Technical Consultant - 8 Month Contract - Located in Downtown Toronto - (Skills Required) - 5+ years working with clients, Architect and Design a Remedy System, Develop and test AR Remedy System, ITSM Software Suite Implementation, Integration experience with service management tools such as Helpdesk, Asset and Change Management. Compensation to be determined. Looking ASAP!
Paul Rix Global Search Consultant Watercrest "Bridging People with Technology" (888) 244-7550 ext.101 Paul@watercrest.net
post.title: (8 Month Contract ) BMC Remedy Technical Consultant
